yoj: Kev cuam tshuam hloov lub zog yam tsis muaj kev thauj khoom
zaus: Tus naj npawb ntawm yoj voj voog hla ib qho taw tes hauv ib lub sijhawm
wavelength: Kev ncua deb ntawm ob lub ntsiab lus sib thooj ntawm nthwv dej
amplitude: Qhov siab tshaj plaws txav ntawm ib qho taw tes los ntawm nws qhov sib npaug hauv nthwv dej
teeb: Daim ntawv lub zog uas mus raws li nthwv dej
electromagnetic spectrum: Ntau yam ntawm txhua qhov ua tau electromagnetic yoj zaus
hluav taws xob: Muaj peev xwm sib txawv ntawm ob lub ntsiab lus hauv ib lub voj voog
hluav taws xob tam sim no: Rate of flow of electric charge
hlau nplaum: Kev quab yuam los ntawm cov hlau nplaum ntawm qee yam khoom
electromagnet: Magnet tsim los ntawm hluav taws xob tam sim no los ntawm ib lub kauj
electroscope: Cov cuab yeej kuaj pom muaj thiab kos npe ntawm tus nqi hluav taws xob
Circuit Court: Kaw txoj kev cia hluav taws xob ntws
series: Circuit Court nrog tag nrho cov khoom txuas nrog hauv ib lub voj voog
thaum uas tig mus: Circuit Court nrog cov khoom sib txuas ntawm ntau ceg
tsis kam: Kev tawm tsam rau hluav taws xob tam sim no ntws hauv tus neeg xyuas pib
ohm lawd: Kev sib raug zoo ntawm voltage, tam sim no, thiab tsis kam (V = IR)
lens: Cov khoom pob tshab uas tuaj yeem tsom lossis sib txawv ntawm lub teeb ci
iav: Smooth nto uas qhia txog lub teeb
xav txog: Rov qab rov qab ntawm lub teeb, suab, lossis lwm yam nthwv dej ntawm qhov chaw
refraction: Khoov ntawm lub teeb thaum nws dhau los ntawm ib qho nruab nrab mus rau lwm qhov
optics: Ceg ntawm physics kawm lub teeb thiab nws cov khoom
